Google Gemini Complete Guide 2026

Everything About Google's Advanced AI Assistant

What is Google Gemini?

Google Gemini is Google's multimodal AI model that can understand text, images, audio, and video. Available through Gemini Advanced and integrated into Google products.

Key Feature: Massive 1M token context window - can handle extremely long documents.
